user_instruction: 'Send an update to the Academic Alliance (academicalliance@university.edu) about our next study session. You can check out my Gmail and Jane'"'"'s Genius Planner for information.'

formatted_items.arguments:
{"to":["academicalliance@university.edu"],"subject":"Update on Upcoming Study Session","body":"Hello Academic Alliance,

I hope you are all doing well. I’m writing to share a brief update on our upcoming study session.

During the session we plan to:
• Recap key points from our previous meeting
• Explore new material in Chapters 4 and 5
• Work through group exercises that focus on statistical methods
• Outline strategies for the approaching mid-term

If there are additional topics you’d like us to cover, please let me know and I’ll add them to the discussion list.

Looking forward to a productive session together.

Best regards,
[Your Name]"}
